skillTree.name: Barded Warhorse Mount
skillTree.description: Enables the Barded Warhorse

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "For the King! Charge", while this Mount is equipped, for Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: The Way of the Penitent
skillTree.description: As the King and the Lady hoped, the exile has made this man more humble and much stronger than ever, returning to defend the kingdom as a shining beacon of faith, honor and purity.

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Chainbreakers
skillTree.description: When the evil and tainted ones place the yoke of slavery upon the necks of honest commoners, and turn their good works to foul ends, that is a sin of unforgivable magnitude. There is only one punishment fitting for such abominable tyrantsâ€¦ Death

effects.description:
Enemy Morale -5 when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf faction
	(local region)

Weapon Strength: +6% when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf factions
	(Lord's army)

Enemy Morale -10 when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf faction
	(local region)

Weapon Strength: +8% when fighting against Chaos, Skaven and Dark Elf factions
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Radiant Soul
skillTree.description: Such is the purity and unshakable faith of a Hermit Knight that foul magics wane and fade wherever he treads

effects.description:
Enemy Morale -5 when fighting against Vampire and Vampire Count factions
	(local region)

Enemy Morale -10 when fighting against Vampire and Vampire Count factions
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Undying Loyalty
skillTree.description: I have fought across the world in the Kingâ€™s name. I have slaughtered greenskins, undead and Chaos worshippers for the honour of the Lady. I have known glorious victoryâ€¦ and painful defeat. Yet I shall never tire, never cease and never relent, for ours is a duty that will never end

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Ladyâ€™s Mantle
skillTree.description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.

skillTree.name: Virtue of Empathy
skillTree.description: Led by noble example, peasants fight longer and harder lest their Lord be dishonoured.

skillTree.name: Basic Training
skillTree.description: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Blessing of the Lady
skillTree.description: The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Blessing of the Lady"

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: For Honor and Justice
skillTree.description: Though a Hermit Knight has no subjects of his own, he will march to protect the commoners as soon as they come asking for aid

skillTree.name: Rallying the Peasants
skillTree.description: Though peasants are not the most reliable soldiers, a Hermit Knight knows that they will fight much harder when their families and home are in inmediate danger

effects.description:
Melee Attack +2 for melee Peasant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +2 for melee Peasant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +4 for melee Peasant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +4 for melee Peasant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +8 for melee Peasant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +8 for melee Peasant units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Preparing for Battle
skillTree.description: When need arises, supplies stored in different places are gathered and put to good use

skillTree.name: Ardent Fury
skillTree.description: When the youngest knights in a hundred miles hear that a Hermit Knight rides to battle, they will march night and day with the hope of fighting alongside such a legend

effects.description:
Charge Bonus +5 for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +1 for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +2% for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus +10 for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +3 for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +3% for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus +15 for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +5 for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for Yeomen, Squire and Knight Errant units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Dukedom's Nobility
skillTree.description: If the invaders keep fighting, even believing they can win, it is the noble's duty and pleasure to disabuse them of that notion. Usually with a thundering final charge in the name of the King and the Lady

effects.description:
Charge Bonus +5 for Cavalry and Infantry units with the Knights Vow or Questing Vow
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +3 for Cavalry and Infantry units with the Knights Vow or Questing Vow
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +3 for Cavalry and Infantry units with the Knights Vow or Questing Vow
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus +10 for Cavalry and Infantry units with the Knights Vow or Questing Vow
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +10 for Cavalry and Infantry units with the Knights Vow or Questing Vow
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Cavalry and Infantry units with the Knights Vow or Questing Vow
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Deliverance Comes
skillTree.description: Often, the first sign of reinforcements is a force of the bravest knights, sent by the King himself, falling from the sky to crush the very center of the enemy lines

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +5% for Flying units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for Flying units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Flying units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Puriyfing the Land
skillTree.description: In times of direst need, the Lady herself summons her champions from all Bretonnia and sends them to help in the defence of her most sacred places

effects.description:
Melee Attack +4 for Paladins and Infantry and Cavalry units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +4 for Paladins and Infantry and Cavalry units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

Ward Save: +2% for Infantry, Cavalry and Paladin units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +8 for Paladins and Infantry and Cavalry units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +8 for Paladins and Infantry and Cavalry units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

Ward Save: +4% for Infantry, Cavalry and Paladin units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +12 for Paladins and Infantry and Cavalry units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

Ward Save: +5% for Infantry, Cavalry and Paladin units with the Grail Vow (Excluding Royal Pegasus Knight and Royal Hippogryph Knight units)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Peasant's Duty
skillTree.description: When the alternative probably involves being killed by their own side, the smallfolk tend to rise to the occasion...

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Protectors of the Realm
skillTree.description: There are literally no opponents too great for them to face down. None.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chivalric Code
skillTree.description: Thou shalt be everywhere and always the champion of the Right and the Good against Injustice and Evil.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ward save: 8% for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Guided by the Lady
skillTree.description: Many Bretonnian veterans speak of a soothing presence felt on occasion in the heat of battle, helping them to find their mark and keep their cool.

effects.description:
Range: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Justiciar
skillTree.description: As an expert in such matters, it is their duty to know the king's law and to mete justice in his name.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Vows of Protection
skillTree.description: When the lands are safer, the tax collectors are safer too

skillTree.name: Devoted of the Goddess
skillTree.description: They've seen the Lady's acts or witnessed her blessed grace.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible Spirit
skillTree.description: Those whom the Lady has blessed fight with an unquenchable, almost super-human zeal, for they know that she sees them.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Consecrated Lands
skillTree.description: Hermit Knights have chosen to defend the sacred places of the Lady and peasants in the region will take his presence as a blessing

skillTree.name: Lordly Conqueror
skillTree.description: The knowledge that they fight in the king's name, with his support, steels an army for the privations of the siege.

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

skillTree.name: Bailiff
skillTree.description: Lords must not be concerned with the collecting of taxes; there are others whose lot it is to feel the people's scorn.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Virtue of Penitent
backgroundSkills.description: A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved king.
